thread.title: Missing La Marque boy found safe, Amber Alert cancelled
thread.title_full: Missing La Marque boy found safe, Amber Alert cancelled

author: Mike Glenn, Houston Chronicle
title: Missing La Marque boy found safe, Amber Alert cancelled
text:
Close Image 1 of 1 
Police are searching for Mark Leeson, 2, who went missing from La Marque on Jan. 26, 2017. 
Police are searching for Mark Leeson, 2, who went missing from La Marque on Jan. 26, 2017. Photo: Amber Alert Missing La Marque boy found safe, Amber Alert cancelled 1 / 1 Back to Gallery 
An Amber Alert has been cancelled for a missing 2-year-old boy from La Marque after he was found safe early Friday morning a day after he disappeared. 
Mark Leeson was found unharmed about 1 a.m. in the company of Hailey Richter, 18, and Zikeyas McCullum, Authorities say Richter is Leeson's mother. 
The boy is being reunited with his grandmother 
Police said they had been searching for the child since he disappeared Thursday and was believed to be with Richter and McCullum. 
No other details about the case were released. Subscribe to HCN
